MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:57am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are working to repair faulty electrical equipment located at Lomond Road. The team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:57am on Friday, 25 December 2020
